lead_paragraph: Cheryl Ford and Deanna Nolan combined for 16 points in a fourth-quarter surge as the Detroit Shock beat the Washington Mystics, 92-86, yesterday in Auburn Hills, Mich.
snippet: Cheryl Ford and Deanna Nolan combined for 16 points in a fourth-quarter surge as the Detroit Shock beat the Washington Mystics, 92-86, yesterday in Auburn Hills, Mich.
